import React, { useState } from 'react' import Input from '../Components/Input' const Signup = () => { const [inputs,setInputs]=useState({}) const [choice,setChoice]=useState("") const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } const handleCompany=()=>{ setChoice("") document.getElementById("job").style.display="none" document.getElementById("general").animate(animation,timer) document.getElementById("company").animate(animation,timer) document.getElementById("general").animate(animation,timer) setTimeout(()=>{ document.getElementById("general").style.transform="translateX(0%)" document.getElementById("company").style.transform="translateX(0%)" },290) } const handleJob=()=>{ document.getElementById("company").style.display="none" document.getElementById("general").animate(animation,timer) document.getElementById("job").animate(animation,timer) document.getElementById("last").animate(animation,timer) setTimeout(()=>{ document.getElementById("general").style.transform="translateX(0%)" document.getElementById("job").style.transform="translateX(0%)" },290) } const handleContinue=()=>{ document.getElementById("general").animate(animation2,timer) document.getElementById("job").animate(animation2,timer) document.getElementById("last").animate(animation2,timer) setTimeout(()=>{ document.getElementById("general").style.transform="translateX(0%)" document.getElementById("company").style.transform="translateX(0%)" },290) } const animation=[ {transform:"translateX(0%)"}, {transform:"translateX(-100%)"} ] const animation2=[ {transform:"translateX(-100%)"}, {transform:"translateX(-200%)"} ] const timer={ iterations:1, duration:300 } return (

SignUp

) } export default Signup
